name: Switchbike
desc: Switchbike is a bike rental service inspired by European bike rental services. Switchbike uses high quality materials for each bicycle. Rather than buying your own bike, you can simply rent a bike for 1 month or longer.

name: Webmedia
desc: Webmedia is a blogging service and has the latest web based knowledge in Japan. This project was primarily used to bring in traffic from Google with the latest SEO technologies.

name: iCMS
desc: iCMS is a CMS system written in PHP, this CMS powers many different websites around Tokyo. I worked on this project as one of the core developers.

name: Moudouken
desc: Moudouken is the official guide dog website in Japan. This website is also powered by the CMS where I worked as a core developer in the iCMS project.
